title: Video Editor for Tiktok & Meta (organic & paid ads)
job_overview:
???? About Us
We're two rapidly growing DTC brands with a global audience — one selling the world’s most mysterious honey (Real Mad Honey), and one offering premium wellness supplements (Pure Nature Goods). Our content is bold, fast-paced, satirical, and made to perform. We don’t just want nice videos. We want jaw-dropping ones.

???? What We’re Looking For
We’re searching for a world-class video editor who understands both the creative and performance sides of content. You’ll be editing videos for ads, social media (mostly TikTok/Instagram Reels), landing pages, product showcases, and more — always with a sharp sense of brand, humor, and conversion power.

You’ll be collaborating closely with our:

???? Performance Marketer – to understand what works

???? Content Manager – for delivery timelines and creative briefs

???? Creative Director – to bring big ideas to life and make them look amazing

????? Your Responsibilities
Edit 2–4 short-form videos per day (or batch accordingly)

Implement creative briefs and storyboards with your own artistic flair

Add dynamic subtitles, sound effects, animations, and transitions that wow

Match the tone and pace of our brand (bold, witty, curious, premium)

Track which creatives perform best and why — then double down

Maintain a high quality of delivery under deadlines

Organize files clearly for efficient collaboration

Collaborate daily via Slack, Trello and Atria. 

???? Must-Haves
Excellent video editing skills 

A portfolio with strong ad-style or storytelling edits

Experience editing UGC, ads, and performance-driven videos

High attention to detail — especially pacing, subtitles, and visual rhythm

Understanding of how hooks and story arcs work in video marketing

Strong English communication skills

Reliable Wi-Fi and self-management

A love for creative experimentation and thinking in Upgrade to see actual infos

???? Bonus Points
Experience working with wellness, supplements, or DTC brands

Motion graphics and animation experience

Copywriting or scripting instincts

Past winners: if you’ve edited a high-performing ad, we want to see it

???? Our Goal for You
We don’t just want someone to follow instructions — we want someone who contributes ideas, pushes the creative boundaries, and becomes the reason people click, watch, and buy.

This is not a “drag and drop” editing job — this is for editors who get the psychology of performance marketing and want to be proud of their work.

?? How to Apply
Send us your portfolio or links to recent work (ads, reels, UGC, etc.)

Briefly explain: Why do you think your editing style fits our brand?

Tell us your editing software of choice

Include the word "WOWHONEY" in your subject line so we know you read this.

Can’t wait to see your magic!
Let’s make something people can’t scroll past. ????????
